name: Youtube Thumbnails Blur and Unblur
description: It works on Computer version of Youtube. This snippet blurs 'Image' (Video Thumbnails and Account Avatars) and you can clear the blur by pointing your mouse over (hovering) any blurred photo.
additional_info:
Features:

- Blur Video Thumbnails (Images)
- Blur profile avatars
- Unblur (clear) on mouse pointing over the blurred image (on hover)
- Support for new version of Youtube
- Legacy Youtube support

discussions.name: pls make the videos you have seen only  blurred
